attributes.action: Petition For Support/Care Workers to get paid more than minimum wage.
attributes.background: Increase minimum wage for Support/Care Workers due to the hours worked, the stress they have to deal with on a daily basis , the lack of time off and overall service that they provide for peoples friends and families.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Minimum wage for carers to be put up to £15: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591328
